channel.title: ErasedPkz autocache error help
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm trying to use the auto-cache downloader that comes with the ErasedPkz client... I uploaded the cache to dropbox, I did everything so when you open the client and you don't have the cache it will download it, but when it finishes at 100% it says "Connecting to File Sever.." and then errors. These are the errors:
ErasedPkz is loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\ErasedPkzcache1\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:80) at client.startUp(client.java:8754) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 509 for URL: http://dl. dropbox.com/u/33278148/ErasedPkzcache1.zip at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Sou rce) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(Unkno wn Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:109) at Update.(Update.java:27) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4742) at client.startUp(client.java:8764) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 509 for URL: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/33278148/ErasedPkzcache1.zip at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(Unknown So urce) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldInt(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(Unknown Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:104) ... 6 more error
Any help you guys can give me would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!

item.title: ErasedPkz autocache error help
item.dc:creator: @jimmyt123 jimmyt123
item.description:
@jimmyt123 wrote:

i know your trying this method its wrong you have to leave a small text file containing something like please extract to C:Drive Before playing thank you. That should work if not get back to me

item.description:
@blakmagyk wrote:

Hey guys, I’m trying to use the auto-cache downloader that comes with the ErasedPkz client…

I uploaded the cache to dropbox, I did everything so when you open the client and you don’t have the cache it will download it, but when it finishes at 100% it says “Connecting to File Sever…” and then errors. These are the errors:
